QuantVarEntHam.initialize — Method

WIP

source
QuantVarEntHam.get_rhoA — Method
get_rhoA(H::AbstractBlock, A::AbstractVector{Int}, N::Int)

Return the reduced density matrix of type YaoAPI.DensityMatrix of the ground state of Hamitlonian H for N sites on subsystem A.

For composite systems consisting of more than 10 sites, the krylov subspace method from KrylovKit is used for extracting the ground state.
